sentences: Peter Clack is an Australian drummer â€“ for ten months he was an early member of hard rock band AC/DC.
In April 1974 he joined Malcolm Young (rhythm guitar), Angus Young (lead guitar), Dave Evans (lead vocals) and Rob Bailey (bass guitar).
Clack continued with AC/DC until January 1975 when he was sacked along with Bailey, Clack's permanent replacement was Phil Rudd.
As of November 2011 he played with Melbourne-based band Raw Sylke.
He is now a drum teacher.
